languages.text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove burning, bleeding, and toxin negative effects from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +<u>(TGH bonus / 2)</u> temporary wounds for each negative effect removed that way.

When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +<u>(TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

languages.text: 着用者のターン終了時、自身と隣接する全ての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除く。その着用者は、そのようにして取り除かれたマイナス効果1つにつき、＋{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d}の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: 着用者のターン終了時、自身と隣接する全ての味方の炎上、出血、毒のマイナス効果を取り除く。その着用者は、そのようにして取り除かれたマイナス効果1つにつき、＋<u>（TGHボーナス/2）</u>の一時的な傷を得る。

着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、自身と隣接する全ての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を取り除く。その着用者は、そのようにして取り除かれた{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}1つにつき、＋{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d}の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を得る。

languages.text: 当装备者回合结束时，移除自己与周围所有邻近盟友身上的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。装备者每移除一项{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，就会获得{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d}点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者回合结束时，移除自己与周围所有邻近盟友身上的燃烧、流血、毒素效果。装备者每移除一项负面效果，就会获得<u>（坚韧加值/2）</u>点临时生命值

当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，移除自己与周围所有邻近盟友身上的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。装备者每移除一项{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，就会获得{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d}点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el portador termina su turno, se cura los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y cura a los aliados adyacentes. El portador gana +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales por cada efecto negativo eliminado de este modo.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador termina su turno, se cura los efectos negativos de quemadura, toxina y hemorragia y cura a los aliados adyacentes. El portador gana +<u>(bonificación por RES / 2)</u> heridas temporales por cada efecto negativo eliminado de este modo.

Cuando el portador termina su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, se cura los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y cura a los aliados adyacentes. El portador gana +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales por cada {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} negativo eliminado de este modo.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger seinen Zug beendet, entfernt er bei sich selbst und allen angrenzenden Verbündeten die {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. Der Träger erhält {uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} für jeden auf diese Weise entfernten negativen Effekt.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger seinen Zug beendet, entfernt er bei sich selbst und allen angrenzenden Verbündeten die negativen Effekte Verbrennung, Blutung und Gift. Der Träger erhält <u>(ZÄH-Bonus / 2)</u> temporäre Wunden für jeden auf diese Weise entfernten negativen Effekt.

Wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, entfernt er bei sich selbst und allen angrenzenden Verbündeten die {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekte{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. Der Träger erhält {uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} für jeden auf diese Weise entfernten negativen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g}.

languages.text: À la fin du tour de l'utilisateur, les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} qui s'appliquaient à lui et à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur reçoit +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires par effet négatif ainsi supprimé.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: À la fin du tour de l'utilisateur, les effets négatifs Combustion, Saignement et Toxine qui s'appliquaient à lui-même et à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur reçoit +<u>(bonus de RES / 2)</u> blessures temporaires par effet négatif ainsi supprimé.

À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} qui s'appliquaient à lui-même et à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur reçoit +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires par {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} négatif ainsi supprimé.

languages.text: Завершая свой ход, персонаж снимает с себя и с союзников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Персонаж получает +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждый снятый таким образом {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

traits.locale_text: Завершая свой ход, персонаж снимает с себя и с союзников на соседних клетках горение, кровотечение и отравление. Персонаж получает +<u>(бонус ВЫН / 2)</u> временного здоровья за каждый снятый таким образом негативный эффект.

Завершая свой ход, персонаж снимает с себя и с союзников на соседних клетках горение, кровотечение и отравление. Персонаж получает +<u>(бонус ВЫН / 2)</u> временного здоровья за каждый снятый таким образом негативный эффект.

Завершая свой ход, персонаж снимает с себя и с союзников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Персонаж получает +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждый снятый таким образом {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g}.
